section.p: Witches come bouncing out across the waves, demonstrating their contempt of nature’s laws by riding in worm-eaten coracles that are as leaky as sieves.
‘Blow winds and crack your cheeks!’ they cry, adding an obscene laugh that causes disgust and horror in equal doses.
‘They’ll curse us to the ocean deeps,’ moans the bosun in abject fear. ‘Do something, captain!’
Make a MAGIC roll at a Difficulty of 15 .
